body: Can you switch to the `grads.at(0)` variant? I ran into a hard-to-find bug because sometimes `kadd` and `kmul` only have one input (see variants that exist in aten_dispatch.cpp) I fixed this in grad executor for the existing gradient formulas but we should fix it for the new ones as well.
body_html: Can you switch to the grads.at(0) variant? I ran into a hard-to-find bug because sometimes kadd and kmul only have one input (see variants that exist in aten_dispatch.cpp) I fixed this in grad executor for the existing gradient formulas but we should fix it for the new ones as well.
